articles.title: Sunscreen recall: What the finding of a cancer-causing chemical means for you - WRAL.com
articles.description: Neutrogena and Aveeno spray sunscreens were recalled due to the presence of a known cancer-causing chemical, yet more contaminated sunscreens remain on the market. What does this mean for your summer sunscreen choices?
articles.content: (CNN)The burning heat of summer has us all reaching for sunscreens. But before you slather that product on your skin, first check to see if it is part of a voluntary recall by sunscreen brands Neutro… [+12017 chars]

articles.title: China's carbon market tops 210 million yuan in first-day trading - Global Times
articles.description: China's national carbon market, the largest emissions trading system in the world, made its debut on Friday with a turnover of 210 million yuan for carbon dioxide emissions on the first day.

articles.author: DNA Web Team
articles.title: Richard Branson did not travel to space, says famous scientist Neil deGrasse Tyson - DNA India
articles.description: Famous astrophysicist and science communicator Neil deGrasse Tyson has come out expressing doubts if we can call where Branson flew as space.
